data.lyric:
[ti:I'm Ready]

[00:00.00]I'm Ready - Sam Smith/Demi Lovato (黛米·洛瓦托)
[00:01.06]Lyrics by：Sam Smith/Demi Lovato/Savan Kotecha/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Peter Svensson
[00:02.13]Composed by：Sam Smith/Demi Lovato/Savan Kotecha/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Peter Svensson
[00:03.20]Sam Smith：
[00:06.21]It's a cold night in my bed in the heat of the summer
[00:12.37]I've been waitin' patiently for a beautiful lover
[00:18.42]He's not a cheater a believer
[00:21.69]He's a warm warm-blooded achiever
[00:24.65]It's a lonely night in my bed in the heat of the summer
[00:29.47]Oh
[00:30.79]Sam Smith：
[00:31.16]It's so hard when you're with someone
[00:34.10]Your heart breaks and it ain't no fun
[00:37.44]But I gotta take that risk tonight
[00:42.92]Sam Smith/Demi Lovato：
[00:43.65]I'm ready I'm ready I'm ready I'm ready
[00:49.63]For someone to love me
[00:53.20]For someone to love me
[00:55.69]I'm ready
[00:57.22]I'm ready
[00:58.78]I'm ready

[01:01.95]For someone to love me for someone to love me

[01:14.30]Ooh yeah
[01:17.32]It's a hot night in my head in the chill of the winter
[01:22.72]No I've been lookin' hard for a lover disguised as a sinner
[01:28.75]No not a cheater a redeemer
[01:32.85]He's a cold cold-blooded defeater
[01:36.05]It's a hot night in my head in the chill of the winter no
